name: Risotto
description: Indulge in creamy comfort with our classic Risotto. Arborio rice cooked to perfection, simmered in savory broth, and enriched with a generous blend of cheeses for a truly decadent experience.

name: Pasta
description: Made daily with farm-fresh eggs and local flour. Light and delicate texture, perfect for soaking up all the delicious flavors.

name: Pizza
description: Crafted with a fresh, hand-tossed crust and topped with premium ingredients. Select from our classic or build-your-own options. (List popular topping combinations or mention signature pizzas)

name: Burger
description: Sink your teeth into a juicy, all-beef patty cooked to your liking. Served on a toasted bun with fresh toppings. (Mention signature burger options or customization options)

name: Salad
description: Light and refreshing, packed with crisp greens, seasonal vegetables, and your choice of protein or dressing. (Highlight unique ingredients or signature salad options)

name: Soup
description: Warm up with a bowl of our homemade soup, crafted with fresh ingredients and changing seasonally. (Mention current soup options or highlight the variety offered)
